General.Name: Yeou Yih Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Yeou Yih Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the processing, production, and trading of stainless-steel products in Taiwan, Korea, Thailand, and internationally. It provides hot rolled stainless steel plates and flat bars. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.2 Yeong Gong 10th Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 82841
